description: Create a transcription job for an audio file using AssemblyAI with advanced options

api_key.info: Your AssemblyAI API key. You can get one from https://www.assemblyai.com/

audio_file_url.info: The URL of the audio file to transcribe (Can be used instead of a File)

speech_model.info: The speech model to use for the transcription

language_code.info: The language of the audio file. Can be set manually if automatic language detection is disabled. See https://www.assemblyai.com/docs/getting-started/supported-languages for a list of supported language codes.

speakers_expected.info: Set the expected number of speakers (optional, enter a number)

success.job_created: Transcription job created successfully with ID: {id}

warnings.url_ignored: Both an audio file and audio URL were specified. The audio URL was ignored.

errors.invalid_speakers_count: Error: Expected Number of Speakers must be a valid integer
errors.no_audio_source: Error: Either an audio file or an audio URL must be specified

logs.speakers_expected_set: Expected number of speakers set to {count}
logs.config_built: Configuration built - Model: {model}, Language Detection: {language_detection}, Speaker Labels: {speaker_labels}
logs.file_not_found: Audio file not found at path: {path}
